items.sentence: What did you tell Tom he was expected to do?
Was it you who told Tom about what happened?
Someone tried to steal Tom's car last night.
It looks like Tom is about the start crying.
I'm the only one who really understands Tom.
I'm sure Tom won't be in Boston next Monday.
I wonder why Tom thought you had to do that.
I wonder where Tom found these blackberries.
Does Tom always buy you everything you want?
Do you think you could do what Tom is doing?
Do you have any idea how long Tom will stay?
Did Tom give you any tips on how to do that?
Are you going to invite Tom to your wedding?
We were able to persuade Tom not to do that.
Tom says he's thinking about not doing that.
Tom says he just wants some peace and quiet.
Let's wait for Tom and the others to return.
Please don't say anything to Tom about this.
I think I'll need to talk to Tom about this.
It should be possible to get Tom to help us.
